auth.signUpInfo: Please sign up to save recipes
auth.signUpDescription: Join RecipeChat and discover your next favorite meal! Get personalized recipe recommendations, save your favorites, and chat with AI to find the perfect dish for any occasion.
auth.loginDescription: Welcome back to RecipeChat! Continue exploring delicious recipes, access your saved favorites, and get instant cooking inspiration.

list.addIngredient: Add a new ingredient to your list

pantry.emptyAlert: Add ingredients below or use bulk paste to get started. Use in chat will be available once you have items.
pantry.editItemDescription: Change the ingredient name and quantity.

valueProps.title: Examples
valueProps.description: Here are some examples of what you can ask. Select one to get started.
valueProps.firstButton: What should I make for dinner tonight?
valueProps.secondButton: What can I make with chicken?
valueProps.createAccountDescription: Create an account or login to save your chat history and recipes.

capabilities.title: Capabilities
capabilities.firstDescription: Remembers previous messages in the same chat
capabilities.thirdDescription: Save generated recipes to your account

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Filters are used to narrow down the recipes you want to generate. Choose from the list below or create a new one.
filters.descriptionWithDelete: Filters are used to narrow down the recipes you want to generate. Choose from the list below or create a new one. Click on a filter to delete it.
filters.noFilters: No filters found. Add a filter to get started.

chat.signUpToSaveDescription: Save your generated recipes, chat history and more.
chat.noChats: No chats found. Start a new chat by asking about a recipe
chat.chatFormContinue: Follow up with a message or corrections
chat.chatFormPantry: What can I make with what I have?

empty.title: No recipes yet
empty.description: Start building your recipe collection by saving recipes from your chats. Create new recipes or discover favorites through AI-powered conversations.

search.title: No matching recipes
search.description: We couldn't find any recipes matching your search. Try adjusting your search terms or browse all your saved recipes.

recipes.name: Name
recipes.paste: Paste a recipe from the web
recipes.addParsedDescription: Add the recipe we parsed for you. You might need to make some changes to the recipe.
recipes.enterUrl: Enter a valid url that contains a recipe. We'll parse it for you so you can save and start cooking!

byId.unsplashDescription: Select an image below, then click save to add it to your recipe.

delete.title: Delete recipe
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this recipe? This action cannot be undone.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.pastDueWarning: Your payment is past due. Please update your payment method.
subscription.freeFeatures: Basic recipe chat, Save up to 10 recipes
subscription.starterFeatures: Unlimited saved recipes, Full chat history, Aisle-sorted shopping lists, Staples management, Cook mode, Recipe remixing
subscription.premiumFeatures: Everything in Starter, 7-day meal planning, Fridge-first recipe suggestions, Multi-user household sync, Customizable video editing, Private clubs and groups, Direct-to-cart grocery integration, Nutrition sync with Apple Health and Google Fit, Priority support

toast.signUp: Please sign up to save recipes.
toast.loginSuccess: Welcome! Here's the recipe you saved:
